BEAST_MASTER.name: A Friend in Need
BEAST_MASTER.description: Use artifacts to summon the Wolf, Llama and Iron Golem allies at least once each.

UPDRAFT_WINDCALLERS_3.name: A Taste Of Their Own Medicine
UPDRAFT_WINDCALLERS_3.description: Using the Updraft Tome, cast Updraft on three Wind Callers at once.

SUMMON_15_BEES_AT_ONCE.name: A, B, Bee, Bee, Bee, Bee, Bee

DEFEAT_JUNGLE_ABOMINATION_ADVENTURE.name: Abomination Domination
DEFEAT_JUNGLE_ABOMINATION_ADVENTURE.description: Complete Overgrown Temple on Adventure or Apocalypse difficulty.

SPINWHEEL_70.name: Acclaimed Acrobat
SPINWHEEL_70.description: Achieve 70 hits with a single activation of the Spinblade.
SPINWHEEL_70.group: Minecraft Dungeons Flames of the Nether

COMPLETE_LOWER_TEMPLE_APOC_PLUS_WITH_DES.name: Adorable Explorer
COMPLETE_LOWER_TEMPLE_APOC_PLUS_WITH_DES.description: Complete Lower Temple on Apocalypse difficulty with the desert rabbit as your companion.

SURVIVE_AFFLICTED_BY_VOIDED_X999.name: Avoidable
SURVIVE_AFFLICTED_BY_VOIDED_X999.description: Survive being afflicted by Voided x999.

HYPERMISSIONS_4.name: Back to Back
HYPERMISSIONS_4.description: Complete two Ancient Hunts and two Daily Trials, in two-player co-op, on the second day of the month

RAID_CAPTAIN_10.name: Bad Omen, Good Loot
RAID_CAPTAIN_10.description: Complete 10 missions where the difficulty has been modified by a Raid Captain's Banner.

TNT_KILL_10.name: Blast Radius
TNT_KILL_10.description: Kill any 10 mobs at once with TNT.

BUBBLE_BOW.name: Bubble Trouble
BUBBLE_BOW.description: Using the Bubble Bow, have 10 mobs bubbled at the same time.

COMPLETE_LEVEL_GROUP2.name: Built On Sand, Set in Stone
COMPLETE_LEVEL_GROUP2.description: Complete Redstone Mines and Cacti Canyon.

BURNING_BREW_DEFEAT_MOB_WITH_FIRE_ENCHAN.name: Burning Up
BURNING_BREW_DEFEAT_MOB_WITH_FIRE_ENCHAN.description: After consuming a Burning Brew, defeat a Mob using a weapon with the Fire Aspect enchantment.

ICE_WAND_KILL_5.name: Chill Out
ICE_WAND_KILL_5.description: Defeat 5 mobs with a single Ice Wand attack

CREEPER_WOODS_NO_KILLS.name: Creeper In The Woods
CREEPER_WOODS_NO_KILLS.description: Complete Creeper Woods on Apocalypse difficulty, without defeating any mobs.

ENCHANTSMITH_SERVICES_3.name: Customized Customer
ENCHANTSMITH_SERVICES_3.description: Make use of the Enchantsmith's services 3 times.

COMPLETE_DESERT_TEMPLE_UNDER_4_MIN.name: Desert Dynamo
COMPLETE_DESERT_TEMPLE_UNDER_4_MIN.description: Complete Desert Temple in under 4 minutes.

ELYTRA_DIVE_ATTACK_12_ENEMIES_AT_ONCE.name: Diver's Dozen
ELYTRA_DIVE_ATTACK_12_ENEMIES_AT_ONCE.description: Using the Elytra, dive attack 12 enemies at once.

COMPLETE_DAILY_TRIAL_EMERALD_ARMOUR.name: Dress for Success
COMPLETE_DAILY_TRIAL_EMERALD_ARMOUR.description: Complete a Daily Trial with a level III challenge while wearing Emerald Gear.

GONG_6.name: Ear Protection Recommended
GONG_6.description: Activate the Gong of Weakening 6 times in 5 seconds.
GONG_6.group: Minecraft Dungeons Flames of the Nether

DEFEAT_1000_ENDERLINGS_WITH_OBSIDIAN_BLA.name: End Run
DEFEAT_1000_ENDERLINGS_WITH_OBSIDIAN_BLA.description: Defeat a total of 1000 Enderlings (Watchling, Blastling, Snareling) with an Obsidian Claymore.

FANCY_CHEST.name: Fancy That!
FANCY_CHEST.description: Find and open your first 'fancy' treasure chest.

TOWER_ALL_EQUIPMENT.name: Fashionable Climber
TOWER_ALL_EQUIPMENT.description: Acquire a melee weapon, ranged weapon, armor, and artifact while climbing the tower.

RELAX_BUBBLE_COLUMN.name: Feeling Bubbly
RELAX_BUBBLE_COLUMN.description: Relax for 5 minutes in a bubble column.

ICE_NO_WEAPONS.name: Frozen Fists
ICE_NO_WEAPONS.description: Complete Frosted Fjord without having a melee or ranged weapon equipped at any time.

KILL_RAVAGER_SQUALL_GOLEM_TIMED.name: Giant Slayer
KILL_RAVAGER_SQUALL_GOLEM_TIMED.description: Defeat a Ravager and a Squall Golem within 5 seconds of each other.

COMPLETE_RADIANT_RAVINE_APOCALYPSE_PLUS.name: Glow and Behold
COMPLETE_RADIANT_RAVINE_APOCALYPSE_PLUS.description: Complete the Radiant Ravine secret mission on any Apocalypse Plus difficulty.

GAUNTLET_GALES_GOLDEN_PARROT.name: Golden Gauntlet
GAUNTLET_GALES_GOLDEN_PARROT.description: Complete Gauntlet of Gales on Apocalypse difficulty with the golden parrot as your companion

FISHING_ROD.name: Gone Fishin'
FISHING_ROD.description: Hit each type of underwater mob with the fishing rod.

COMPLETE_SQUID_COAST.name: Happy Camper
COMPLETE_SQUID_COAST.description: Complete Squid Coast and set up camp.

DEFEAT_BROKEN_HEART_OF_ENDER.name: Heartbreaker
DEFEAT_BROKEN_HEART_OF_ENDER.description: Defeat the Vengeful Heart of Ender.

DEFEAT_TEMPEST_GOLEM_PETS.name: Herd Mentality
DEFEAT_TEMPEST_GOLEM_PETS.description: Defeat the Tempest Golem while four pets are active.

COMPLETE_LEVEL_GROUP3.name: High and Dry
COMPLETE_LEVEL_GROUP3.description: Complete Desert Temple, Fiery Forge and Highblock Halls.

DEFEAT_ARCH_ILLAGER_HARD.name: High Treason
DEFEAT_ARCH_ILLAGER_HARD.description: Defeat the Arch-Illager on Apocalypse difficulty.

HOMECOMING.name: Homecoming
HOMECOMING.description: During Ancient Hunts, bring a wolf, a bat, and a soul entity to visit familiar locations.

COMPLETE_CACTI_CANYON_UNDER_5_MIN.name: Hot-Footed Hero
COMPLETE_CACTI_CANYON_UNDER_5_MIN.description: Complete Cacti Canyon in under 5 minutes.

STORAGE_CHEST_50.name: How Does It All Fit?
STORAGE_CHEST_50.description: Store 50 items in the Storage Chest.

UNLOCK_ALL_ITEMS_BASE_AND_DLC.name: I Need Them All
UNLOCK_ALL_ITEMS_BASE_AND_DLC.description: Unlock all mission item drops in the base game and DLCs.

GLOWSQUID_ICEWAND.name: Iceologer's Revenge
GLOWSQUID_ICEWAND.description: Kill a Glow Squid using an Ice Wand.

COMPLETE_TOWER_APOCALYPSE.name: Indomitable
COMPLETE_TOWER_APOCALYPSE.description: Complete a tower run on Apocalypse difficulty.

DEFEAT_MOOSHROOM_MONSTROSITY_ITEMS.name: Jungle Fungus
DEFEAT_MOOSHROOM_MONSTROSITY_ITEMS.description: Defeat the Mooshroom Monstrosity using only gear unique to the jungle.

OCELOT_ARMOUR.name: Leader of the Pack
OCELOT_ARMOUR.description: Wear the Ocelot Armour and complete any mission featuring Ocelots without killing any of them.

MERCHANTS_6.name: Locally Sourced
MERCHANTS_6.description: Have 6 merchants in your camp at once.

DEFEAT_WRETCHED_WRAITH_ADVENTURE.name: Lone Champion
DEFEAT_WRETCHED_WRAITH_ADVENTURE.description: Complete Lone Fortress on Adventure or Apocalypse difficulty.

COMPLETE_LOST_SETTLEMENT.name: Lost In The Snow
COMPLETE_LOST_SETTLEMENT.description: Complete the Lost Settlement secret mission.

LOST_CONDUIT.name: Lost Power
LOST_CONDUIT.description: Return the lost conduit to its rightful place.

FULL_ENCHANTED_GEAR_SET.name: Maxed Out And Geared Up
FULL_ENCHANTED_GEAR_SET.description: Equip a gear set consisting of fully enchanted items (3 enchantment slots upgraded to level 3).

TOWER_ALL_VENDOR_PURCHASE.name: Meet and Greet
TOWER_ALL_VENDOR_PURCHASE.description: Make a purchase from each of the tower's vendors.

DEFEAT_REDSTONE_MONSTROSITY_PETS.name: Mine Is Cuter Than Yours!
DEFEAT_REDSTONE_MONSTROSITY_PETS.description: Defeat the Redstone Monstrosity with any Ministrosity Pet equipped.

COMPLETE_NETHER_WASTES_APOCALYPSE.name: Nether Been Better
COMPLETE_NETHER_WASTES_APOCALYPSE.description: Complete Nether Wastes on Apocalypse difficulty.
COMPLETE_NETHER_WASTES_APOCALYPSE.group: Minecraft Dungeons Flames of the Nether

COMPLETE_PANDA_PLATEAU.name: Pandamonium
COMPLETE_PANDA_PLATEAU.description: Complete the Panda Plateau secret mission.

PET_THE_DOG.name: Pet the Dog
PET_THE_DOG.description: "Who's a good wolf? You are! Yes, you are."

COMPLETE_OBSIDIAN_PINNACLE_APOCALYPSE5.name: Post Post-Apocalypse
COMPLETE_OBSIDIAN_PINNACLE_APOCALYPSE5.description: Complete Obsidian Pinnacle on Apocalypse Plus 5 difficulty.

COMPLETE_COLOSSAL_RAMPART.name: Rampart Rampage
COMPLETE_COLOSSAL_RAMPART.description: Complete the Colossal Rampart secret mission.

DEATH_BARTER_2.name: Repeat Customer
DEATH_BARTER_2.description: Save yourself by using the Death Barter enchantment twice in a single mission.

HORSE_EMOTE_AT_SKELETON_HORSEMAN.name: Same To You, Buddy 2.0
HORSE_EMOTE_AT_SKELETON_HORSEMAN.description: Use the Horse Ride emote at a Skeleton Horseman.

ROAR_AT_JBOMINATION.name: Same To You, Buddy!
ROAR_AT_JBOMINATION.description: Use the Abomination Roar emote at the Jungle Abomination.

DEFEAT_ARCH_ILLAGER_ANY.name: Saved The Overworld
DEFEAT_ARCH_ILLAGER_ANY.description: Defeat the Arch-Illager at the Obsidian Pinnacle.

TRIDENT.name: Seafood Skewer
TRIDENT.description: Defeat 10 mobs with a single Trident explosion.

EFFECTS_TRIGGER_5.name: Seriously Overpowered
EFFECTS_TRIGGER_5.description: Equip a gilded, unique, fully enchanted weapon.

ICE_SLIDE_500.name: Smooth Operator
ICE_SLIDE_500.description: Slide a total distance of 500 blocks on ice.

COMPLETE_LEVEL_WITH_OLD_SEASON_COSMETICS.name: So Last Season
COMPLETE_LEVEL_WITH_OLD_SEASON_COSMETICS.description: Complete a mission with a full set of cosmetics (Cape, Pet, Emote, Flairs) from a previous season.

USE_SOUL_TOTEM_50.name: Soul Powered
USE_SOUL_TOTEM_50.description: Use the Soul Totem of Casting 50 times.

STORAGE_ROOM.name: Staff Only (secret)
STORAGE_ROOM.description: You aren't supposed to be here!

COMPLETE_DINGY_JUNGLE_POTION.name: Survival Skills
COMPLETE_DINGY_JUNGLE_POTION.description: Complete Dingy Jungle without using a healing potion or losing a life.

REACH_TOP_OF_BROKEN_CITADEL_NO_HIT_SHULK.name: Take the High Road
REACH_TOP_OF_BROKEN_CITADEL_NO_HIT_SHULK.description: Reach the top of the Broken Citadel without ever getting hit by a Shulker.

COMPLETE_GALE_SANCTUM_ADVENTURE.name: Taming the Storm
COMPLETE_GALE_SANCTUM_ADVENTURE.description: Complete Gale Sanctum on Adventure or Apocalypse difficulty.

COMPLETE_TOWER_WITHOUT_USING_MERCHANTS.name: Thanks But No Thanks!
COMPLETE_TOWER_WITHOUT_USING_MERCHANTS.description: Complete a tower without using the services of the Guildsmith, Enchantsmith and Powersmith.

COMPLETE_LEVEL_GROUP1.name: The Plot Thickens
COMPLETE_LEVEL_GROUP1.description: Complete Pumpkin Pastures and Soggy Swamp.

TRAVEL_THROUGH_END_PORTAL.name: To the End!
TRAVEL_THROUGH_END_PORTAL.description: Travel through the End Portal to the End Wilds.

COMPLETE_TOWER_ADVENTURE.name: Tower Power
COMPLETE_TOWER_ADVENTURE.description: Complete a tower run on Adventure difficulty.

VISIT_15_TOWER_BIOMES.name: Tower Tourist
VISIT_15_TOWER_BIOMES.description: Encounter 15 different biomes in your Tower adventures.

COMPLETE_TREETOP_WEARING_ROOT_ROT.name: Treetop Trespasser
COMPLETE_TREETOP_WEARING_ROOT_ROT.description: Complete Treetop Tangle wearing the Root Rot armor.

COMPLETE_TREETOP_TANGLE_APOCALYPSE_PLUS.name: Treetop Untangled
COMPLETE_TREETOP_TANGLE_APOCALYPSE_PLUS.description: Complete Treetop Tangle on any Apocalypse Plus difficulty.

COMPLETE_NETHER_SECRET_APOCALYPSE_PLUS.name: Trial by Fire
COMPLETE_NETHER_SECRET_APOCALYPSE_PLUS.description: Complete all secret Nether levels on any Apocalypse Plus difficulty.
COMPLETE_NETHER_SECRET_APOCALYPSE_PLUS.group: Minecraft Dungeons Flames of the Nether

COMPLETE_ABYSSAL_MONUMENT_APOCALYPSE.name: Turn the Tide
COMPLETE_ABYSSAL_MONUMENT_APOCALYPSE.description: Complete Abyssal Monument on Apocalypse difficulty.

KILL_10_MOUNTAINEER_TEMPEST_KNIFE_TIMED.name: Whirlwind Warrior
KILL_10_MOUNTAINEER_TEMPEST_KNIFE_TIMED.description: Using the Tempest Knife, defeat 10 Mountaineer mobs within 10 seconds.

LLAMA_OFFERING.name: Wooly Wisdom
LLAMA_OFFERING.description: Find the chamber dedicated to the humble Llama and make an offering.

FULLY_UPGRADE_ENCHANTMENT.name: Worked Like A Charm
FULLY_UPGRADE_ENCHANTMENT.description: Enchant an item and upgrade the enchantment to Tier 3.
